Views differ on whether aspirin should have a role in this population. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/dt_180216_pills_ecg_stethoscope_800x600.jpg Low-Dose Aspirin in Heart Failure Sans AF: Recommended or Not? http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892787?src=rss Cardiology News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 14:16:46 EST ECCO Vedolizumab Emerges as Option in IBD After Anti-TNF Failure http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892784?src=rss The management of anti-TNF-resistant patients is an important clinical challenge, but new data suggest that vedolizumab helps mucosal healing in Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/wc_160321_crohns_disease_800x600.jpg Vedolizumab Emerges as Option in IBD After Anti-TNF Failure http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892784?src=rss Gastroenterology News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 12:35:36 EST Mysterious Symptoms in US Diplomats Deemed Neurologic Injury http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892775?src=rss Cuba diplomats have concussion-like symptoms consistent with brain injury in the absence of blunt head trauma after encountering intense sounds and vibrations. The cause remains elusive. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/wc_180216_us_embassy_cuba_800x600.jpg Mysterious Symptoms in US Diplomats Deemed Neurologic Injury http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892775?src=rss Neurology & Neurosurgery News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 10:45:19 EST FDA Okays Glooko Insulin Dosing System for Type 2 Diabetes http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892772?src=rss New app allows clinicians to personalize insulin dose titration for patients and reminds them to follow instructions. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/ht_180216_mids_glooko_800x600.jpg FDA Okays Glooko Insulin Dosing System for Type 2 Diabetes http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892772?src=rss Diabetes & Endocrinology News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 10:06:15 EST Safety Similar With Radial vs Ulnar Approach in Cardiac Cath http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892769?src=rss Major adverse cardiovascular event rates were not significantly different from those obtained with radial artery access, but transulnar access remains on the fringe of the PCI world. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/sp_180215_hand_anatomy_800x600.jpg Safety Similar With Radial vs Ulnar Approach in Cardiac Cath http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892769?src=rss Cardiology News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 09:40:19 EST Patients Want More Information Before Imaging Tests http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892770?src=rss Half of survey respondents said they had to find information on their own. Authors say communication may focus too much on results and radiation exposure and not enough on the test itself. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/dt_180212_doctor_patient_talk_800x600.jpg Patients Want More Information Before Imaging Tests http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892770?src=rss Family Medicine/Primary Care News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 09:18:48 EST FDA Panel Gives Exparel Thumbs Down as Regional Nerve Block http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892768?src=rss An FDA advisory committee voted 6 to 4 against recommending bupivacaine liposomal injectable suspension as a nerve block for regional, postsurgical analgesia. <br /> <i></i> http://img.medscape.com/thumbnail_library/dt_180216_thumbs_down_800x600.jpg FDA Panel Gives Exparel Thumbs Down as Regional Nerve Block http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892768?src=rss Neurology & Neurosurgery News Fri, 16 Feb 2018 08:17:51 EST GUCS 'Really Durable Benefit' Emerging With Bladder Cancer ImmunoTx http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/892767?src=rss Overall survival curves in cancer treatment trials typically go down with time.
